A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars Episode VIII The Last Jedi is worthy of the name Star Wars & so totally worth watching & being added to the Star Wars franchise and films!!!!  This movie is definitely & absolutely the Best Star Wars film since The Empire Strikes Back & may also just be better than Empire....   The Last Jedi is assuredly just as good & great as Empire!!!!!   It is Stunning\, Extraordinary\, Spectacular\, Outstanding\, Marvelous\, Exceptional\, Superb\, Awesome\, Incredible\, Epic\, Fun\, Unique\, Heart-Warming\, Kid-Friendly\, Family movie\, Visually Gorgeous\, Rich\, Magical\, Inspiring with Inspirational & Witty & Funny & Relatable & Endearing & Memorable Characters\, has a Truly Great Ending\, strong acting\, Nostalgic\, thought provoking\, Uplifting\, Touching\, Imaginative\, Enchanting\, Moving\, Powerful\, Amazing Masterpiece with Amazing & Masterful & Beautiful & Wonderful music and score and themes\, Super Great Special Effects\, Timeless\, Captivating\, Sure Crowd-Pleaser\, Clever\, Upbeat\, Intelligent\, Light-Hearted\, Immersive\, Spiritual\, Gripping\, Fast-Paced\, Real Feel-Good\, Witty\, Endearing\, Terrific\, Emotional\, Authentic Acting\, Fresh\, Riveting\, Humorous\, Intricate\, Balanced\, Phenomenal & Absolutely Splendid!!!!!   The Last Jedi may have become my new Favorite Star Wars movie....   This movie awed me & shook me & stole my heart and I was amazed & elated!!!!  I will be seeing this movie multiple (5 at the very least) times....   This is a true Star Wars movie & I quite enjoyed & was pleased with the bold steps & risks this film takes to continue the vast universe\, tradition\, splendor and legacy of & that is Star Wars!!!!
